name: Half-Dragon
description: An inherited template that can be added to any living, corporeal creature, granting them draconic features and abilities.

special_abilities.name: Natural Attacks
special_abilities.description: Gains two claw attacks and a bite attack.

special_abilities.name: Breath Weapon
special_abilities.description: Gains a breath weapon based on dragon variety, usable once per day.

special_abilities.name: Draconic Immunities
special_abilities.description: Immunity to sleep and paralysis effects, plus an additional immunity based on dragon variety.
